story:
Glogauair Berlin www.glogauair.net 

www.uzmasultan.com Hello there, here I am asking to raise a sum for my artist in residence based in Berlin. I have come from London and got accepted for this residency in March earlier this year. 

www.uzmasultan.com
I am currently showing at Liverpool Independents Biennial UK. www.independentsbiennial.com
I'm currently at Glogauair Artist in Residence program in Berlin and being in this trendy Art capital of the world besides being exciting is enriching my studio practice as I have met some good artists besides making new connections.
  1. I applied for a grant to the the Arts Council UK for Artist's International Development Fund but was informed that the application did not fit the criteria as they do not fund Artist Residencies. 

Short Summary

I have just spent nearly a year in Pakistan as well, set up a studio there too to be more involved in the Art in Pakistan.
I've  been based  in London all these years prior to that.
I felt myself wanting to be more involved with the Art in Pakistan and also to deal with my homesickness.
The kind of work I'm making at the moment is to do with food and food packaging also some of the packaging of consumer products in Pakistan have double meaning like the painting called 'Chilli Saas'.
Saas which also has the literal meaning of mother in law in Urdu.
Currently I'm in Berlin doing a Residency at Glogauair.
www.glogauair.net
  This residency has a fee of 500 Euros per month which is the rent for the studio for me to live and work in. And I came to work here for 3 months.
I did two different jobs in London in order to come here. Berlin being the Art capital of the world is important for its Art and Artists.
If you believe in the sincerity of his application then please share it as there may be other people who may be able to help.  
I had applied for an Arts funding in the UK before coming to Berlin  but was informed that they did not fund residencies!

Your Impact and what you get

 Please share and promote my passion for what I do and  receive some original Art direct from the Artist.
You will be directly engaged with a mid career artist and will receive invites to future shows if interested.  
However little the contribution it doesn't matter.
I've been practising as a professional artist for 10 plus years in London,UK & also Karachi,Pakistan.
I am giving away and very high quality signed Limited Edition digital prints as a perk as an exchange from a contribution, produced from my large paintings in London.

What I Want:-
1500 Euros is just the rent for the Residency for 3 months.
Please feel free to go to my webpage www.uzmasultan.com
www.axisweb.org/artist/uzmasultan
The AIR (artist in residence) is www.glogauair.net
Gave a talk at Glogauair as part of Berlin Art Detours today 20 Sep at 4pm during Berlin Art Week.
http://facebook.com/sultanuzma
If in London or Berlin I will present you with a high quality digital print of my larger paintings to you person.
The reason I have put the campaign in GB pounds is that I have a UK bank account.
I am preparing for a solo show in Karachi,Pakistan and I've been funding myself mainly by getting paid work and sale of my paintings.
THANK YOU!

story:
I fell in love with this city almost 4 years ago and it never stops surprising me. Basically, you bump into a piece of Art (with a capital A) every 5 minutes. It's just incredible how Art enters the city and how city enters into Art. It has this fascinating mix of a postcard city, like Venice, -being one of the most popular tourist destinations, with all the treasures it has (Michelangelo's David alone would be quite enough) and a real city, with its busy streets, buses and people in a hurry ("all'Italiana" obviously =). Add to that a rather severe medieval kick and you will get the picture. 

Apart from that, there's definitely an "off the beaten path" Florence and in my project I want to show both well-known monuments and sites and the hidden ones.  

 

Let's get straight to the topic now. I am aiming to make 30 drawings, using special kind of pencils. I have elaborated this technique a while ago. It is all about the relation between colour and tone, the way I perceive every single colour. Erasing-is a crucial part of the process. There's nothing more satisfying than giving my drawing a good go with an eraser, in the light parts, where the sun toches marble or whichever other surface. I do call this technique "drawing with an eraser"sometimes=) The pencils I use are coloured, though I am not approaching it as a "paintily " kind of drawing. That's to say I am not using a blue for a blue, or red for a red. It's more of a impressionist drawing. I am trying to create a certain mood, trying to build a story behind every monument, trying to capture that particular day, minute, second in which I was drawing it. So that you get the feeling you were there with me on that day to admire this site. 

I want to make a sort of Art-postcards, original pieces that will remind you of Florence, even if you never been to. I want to share those memories with you, guys.

I would love to have  a possibility to exhibit this work. It would be great to have a possibility to familiarize the public with this project, sharing my mameories and emotions with people. What's the point of it, if you guys don't get to see it?)) And to realize that dream I will need your generous help, as nothing is free in this world, and getting a good space to exhibit costs a good deal. 

Give  us (me and my art) a chance!!!=)

I will need you help to cover materials cost as well. 

Your generosity and participation will not stay unrewarded.

(see the column on the right to discover the funky or ever so slightly funky..or not funky at all=) rewards you get) 

AN IMMENSE THANKYOU TO EVERYONE WHO SUPPORTS MY INITIATIVE !!!

story:
english


free•dom |ˈfrēdəm|

noun

•the power or right to act, speak, or think as one wants without hindrance or restraint : we do have some freedom of choice | he talks of revoking some of the freedoms.

• absence of subjection to foreign domination or despotic government : he was a champion of Irish freedom.

• the state of not being imprisoned or enslaved : the shark thrashed its way to freedom.

• the state of being physically unrestricted and able to move easily : the shorts have a side split for freedom of movement.

• ( freedom from) the state of not being subject to or affected by (a particular undesirable thing) : government policies to achieve freedom from want.

• the power of self-determination attributed to the will; the quality of being independent of fate or necessity.

• unrestricted use of something : the dog is happy having the freedom of the house when we are out.

• archaic familiarity or openness in speech or behavior.


what is it?

free•dom - a solo of many people is a physical theater play that explores the concept of freedom and raises the questions: are you free? what holds you back? who holds you back? is freedom even possible?

it incorporates real time interactive video and physical theater and creates a language able to be understood by virtually anyone.

its inspired by the work of frieder weiss and chunky move, james thiérré and robert wilson, directed by steve cook and has the collaboration of frieder weiss. 


physical theater? real time interactive video? what are you talking about?

physical theater is also called movement theater. our friend wikipedia has a good definition and if you want to read more about it click here.

"the term "physical theater" has been applied to performances consisting mainly of:

  • some forms of puppetry

  • theatrical clowning/physical comedy/[mime]

  • some form of dance theater

  • using people in the background as extra (actor) to make the scene more realistic

physical theater may utilize pre-text, but the primary focus is on the physical work of the actors, expressed through the use of their bodies. It is a highly visual form of theater. the means of expression are always primarily physical rather than textual.

  • is often devised, rather than originated from a pre-existing script.

  • has inter-disciplinary origins - it crosses between music, dance, visual art as well as theater.

  • challenges the traditional, proscenium arch, performer/audience relationship.

  • celebrates the non-passive audience.

  • utilizes the imagination of the audience in conjunction with the imagination of the performers."

real time interactive video is the first video you see on the free•dom promotional video. it's a software developed by frieder weiss that interprets the performer's movement and is able to create projections based on that. it's also able to create sound and even music from the performer's movement. it's a very beautiful effect and it fits free•dom very well.


about this campaign

this is the fist step to make free•dom happen. the money raised is to develop the play and it will pay for rehearsal space, research material, video development, furniture and props, equipment rental and the small crew involved.  it's a very tight budget, but it can make it happen.

why just the first step? because it's hard to raise all the money all at once. but hey, 5,000 is the minimum there is nothing wrong on raising more and it will certainly boost free•dom even more.


other ways you can help

spread the word! that's the easier and quicker way to help. but if you feel like helping a bit more send me an email (info@andressafurletti.com), i'll certainly need help in many ways. maybe you have a space you could offer, maybe you want to come and shoot one rehearsal, maybe you want to write about it, maybe you have an idea to share, maybe you want to suggest something. it's all welcome.


português


li•ber•da•de  -  li.beɾ.ˈda.dʒi

sf (lat libertate)

·        Estado de pessoa livre e isenta de restrição externa ou coação física ou moral.

·        Poder de exercer livremente a sua vontade.

·        Condição de não ser sujeito, como indivíduo ou comunidade, a controle ou arbitrariedades políticas estrangeiras.

·        Condição do ser que não vive em cativeiro.

·        Condição de pessoa não sujeita a escravidão ou servidão.

·        Isenção de todas as restrições, exceto as prescritas pelos direitos legais de outrem.

·        Independência, autonomia.

·        Ousadia.

·        Permissão.

·        Imunidade.


o que é?


free•dom - a solo of many people (li•ber•da•de – um solo de muitas pessoas) é uma peça de teatro físico que explora o conceito de liberdade e levanta as perguntas: você é livre? o que te prende? quem te prende? a liberdade é possível?

a peça incorpora vídeo interativo em tempo real e cria uma linguagem capaz de ser entendia por virtualmente qualquer pessoa.

é inspirada por frieder weiss e chucky move, james thiérrée e robert wilson e tem direção de steve cook e colaboração de frieder weiss.

 

teatro físico? vídeo interativo em tempo real? do que você está falando?


o termo teatro físico é aplicado em performance que contém em maioria:

  • algum tipo de marionete (puppetry)

  • comédia física, palhaço teatral, comédia física e mímica.

  • alguma forma de teatro-dança.

o teatro físico pode utilizar texto mas o foco é no trabalho físico dos atores. é uma forma muito visual de teatro. as formas de expressão são mais físicas que textuais.

  • é frequentemente criado nos ensaios ao invés de ser originado de uma peça pré existente.

  • tem origem multidisciplinar, combinando muitas vezes dança, música, artes plásticas e teatro convencional.

  • desafia a tradicional relação entra platéia e ator.

  • celebra a audiência não passiva.

  • utiliza a imaginação da platéia em conjunto com a imaginação dos atores

 

vídeo interativo em tempo real é a primeira performance mostrada no vídeo promocional acima. é um software criado por frieder weiss que interpreta o movimento do ator e é capaz de criar projeções baseadas nos movimentos. é também capaz de criar sons a até música a partir dos movimentos do ator. é um efeito belíssimo e se encaixa em free•dom muito bem.

sobre esta campanha


esse é o primeiro passo para fazer free•dom acontecer. O dinheiro arrecadado será destinado para desenvolver a peça, aluguel de salas de ensaio, material de ensaio, material de pesquisa, objetos cênicos, aluguel de equipamento, desenvolvimento de vídeos e para a pequena equipe envolvida. é um orçamento apertado, mas podemos fazer acontecer.

por que somente o primeiro passo? porque é difícil arrecadar muito dinheiro de uma vez. Mas, U$5.000 é só o mínimo, não é problema nenhum arrecadar mais a vai certamente dar um gás ainda maior para free•dom.

outras formas de ajudar


divulgue! é a maneira mais fácil e rápida de ajudar. mas se você quiser ajudar de alguma outra forma me mande um e-mail (info@andressafurletti.com), certamente eu vou precisar de muita ajuda. talvez você tenha uma sala de ensaio, talvez você queira vir filmar um ensaio, talvez você queira escrever sobre a peça, talvez você tenha uma idéia ou uma sugestão. toda ajuda é sempre bem-vinda.

 

vídeo promocional em português:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVsyL0B7d3U
story_txt:
english
free•dom |ˈfrēdəm|
noun
•the power or right to act, speak, or think as one wants without hindrance or restraint : we do have some freedom of choice | he talks of revoking some of the freedoms. 
• absence of subjection to foreign domination or despotic government : he was a champion of Irish freedom.
• the state of not being imprisoned or enslaved : the shark thrashed its way to freedom.
• the state of being physically unrestricted and able to move easily : the shorts have a side split for freedom of movement.
• ( freedom from) the state of not being subject to or affected by (a particular undesirable thing) : government policies to achieve freedom from want.
• the power of self-determination attributed to the will; the quality of being independent of fate or necessity.
• unrestricted use of something : the dog is happy having the freedom of the house when we are out.
• archaic familiarity or openness in speech or behavior.
what is it?

free•dom - a solo of many people is a physical theater play that explores the concept of freedom and raises the questions: are you free? what holds you back? who holds you back? is freedom even possible?
it incorporates real time interactive video and physical theater and creates a language able to be understood by virtually anyone. 
its inspired by the work of frieder weiss and chunky move, james thiérré and robert wilson, directed by steve cook and has the collaboration of frieder weiss. 

physical theater? real time interactive video? what are you talking about?physical theater is also called movement theater. our friend wikipedia has a good definition and if you want to read more about it click here. "the term "physical theater" has been applied to performances consisting mainly of:

some forms of puppetry
theatrical clowning/physical comedy/[mime]
some form of dance theater
using people in the background as extra (actor) to make the scene more realistic
physical theater may utilize pre-text, but the primary focus is on 
the physical work of the actors, expressed through the use of their 
bodies. It is a highly visual form of theater. the means of expression are always primarily physical rather than textual.

is often devised, rather than originated from a pre-existing script.
has inter-disciplinary origins - it crosses between music, dance, visual art as well as theater.
challenges the traditional, proscenium arch, performer/audience relationship.
celebrates the non-passive audience.
utilizes the imagination of the audience in conjunction with the imagination of the performers."
real time interactive video is the first video you see on the free•dom promotional video. it's a software developed by frieder weiss that interprets the performer's movement and is able to create projections based on that. it's also able to create sound and even music from the performer's movement. it's a very beautiful effect and it fits free•dom very well.about this campaign 
this is the fist step to make free•dom
 happen. the money raised is to develop the play and it will pay for 
rehearsal space, research material, video development, furniture and 
props, equipment rental and the small crew involved.  it's a very tight 
budget, but it can make it happen. why just the first step? 
because it's hard to raise all the money all at once. but hey, 5,000 is 
the minimum there is nothing wrong on raising more and it will certainly
 boost free•dom even more. 
other ways you can help
spread the word! that's the easier and quicker way to help. but if you feel like helping a bit more send me an email (info@andressafurletti.com), i'll certainly need help in many ways. maybe you have a space you could offer, maybe you want to come and shoot one rehearsal, maybe you want to write about it, maybe you have an idea to share, maybe you want to suggest something. it's all welcome.

português
li•ber•da•de
 -  li.beɾ.ˈda.dʒi
sf (lat libertate) 
·      
 Estado de pessoa livre e isenta de restrição externa ou
coação física ou moral. 
·      
 Poder de exercer livremente a sua vontade. 
·      
 Condição de
não ser sujeito, como indivíduo ou comunidade, a controle ou arbitrariedades
políticas estrangeiras. 
·      
 Condição do ser que não vive em cativeiro. 
·      
 Condição de pessoa não sujeita a escravidão ou servidão. 
·      
 Isenção de
todas as restrições, exceto as prescritas pelos direitos legais de outrem. 
·      
 Independência, autonomia.

·      
 Ousadia. 
·      
 Permissão. 
·      
 Imunidade.

o que é?

free•dom - a solo of many people (li•ber•da•de – um solo de muitas pessoas) é uma peça
de teatro físico que explora o conceito de liberdade e levanta as perguntas: você é livre? o que te prende? quem te
prende? a liberdade é possível? 
a peça incorpora vídeo interativo em tempo real e cria uma linguagem
capaz de ser entendia por virtualmente qualquer pessoa. 
é inspirada por frieder weiss e chucky move, james thiérrée e robert
wilson e tem direção de steve cook e colaboração de frieder weiss. 
 
teatro físico? vídeo interativo em
tempo real? do que você está falando? 

o termo teatro físico é aplicado em performance
que contém em maioria:

algum tipo de marionete (puppetry)
comédia física, palhaço
     teatral, comédia física e mímica.
alguma forma de teatro-dança.

o teatro físico pode utilizar texto mas o foco é no trabalho físico dos
atores. é uma forma muito visual de teatro. as formas de expressão são mais
físicas que textuais.

é frequentemente criado nos
     ensaios ao invés de ser originado de uma peça pré existente.
tem origem multidisciplinar,
     combinando muitas vezes dança, música, artes plásticas e teatro
     convencional. 
desafia a tradicional relação
     entra platéia e ator. 
celebra a audiência não
     passiva.
utiliza a imaginação da platéia
     em conjunto com a imaginação dos atores

 
vídeo
interativo em tempo real é a
primeira performance mostrada no vídeo promocional acima. é um software criado
por frieder weiss que interpreta o movimento do ator e é capaz de criar
projeções baseadas nos movimentos. é também capaz de criar sons a até música a
partir dos movimentos do ator. é um efeito belíssimo e se encaixa em free•dom
muito bem.
sobre esta campanha

esse é o primeiro passo para fazer free•dom
acontecer. O dinheiro arrecadado será destinado para desenvolver a peça,
aluguel de salas de ensaio, material de ensaio, material de pesquisa, objetos
cênicos, aluguel de equipamento, desenvolvimento de vídeos e para a pequena equipe
envolvida. é um orçamento apertado, mas podemos fazer acontecer. 
por que
somente o primeiro passo? porque é difícil arrecadar muito dinheiro de uma vez.
Mas, U$5.000 é só o mínimo, não é problema nenhum arrecadar mais a vai
certamente dar um gás ainda maior para free•dom.

outras formas de ajudar

divulgue! é a maneira mais fácil e rápida de ajudar. mas se você quiser ajudar
de alguma outra forma me mande um e-mail (info@andressafurletti.com),
certamente eu vou precisar de muita ajuda. talvez você tenha uma sala de ensaio,
talvez você queira vir filmar um ensaio, talvez você queira escrever sobre a
peça, talvez você tenha uma idéia ou uma sugestão. toda ajuda é sempre bem-vinda.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVsyL0B7d3U

story:
In a few words...

We are raising money for the BoochNonagon at camp Get Lost @ Burning Man 2012.  What's a BoochNonagon you ask? Let's start with what's a nonagon. Well, a nonagon is a 9 sided polygon. The Booch part refers the vaulted, carnival-like tent roof comprised of 14 foot long triangles made of dried kombucha leather. If you wondering what kombucha leather is, imagine a fruit roll up but instead of fruit the roll up is made of a symbiotic culture of bacteria and yeast in a cellulose pancake.

So that's what the BoochNonagon is.  But really, our camp is an opportunity for us to share what we love with the Burning Man community: giving people bad directions and good kombucha.  And although we love electronic music the  BoochNonagon will house a stage for the sometimes hard to find live musics. (If you'd like to contribute your talents and/or music by performing on our stage, we'd sincerely love to have you!  Please email us at boochnonagon@gmail.com

Here's where it gets interesting

So wait, we're GIFTING away Kombucha in a 9 sided structure with a roof made of dried kombucha leather and there's a stage inside for live music and performance? Yes, and here's where it gets really interesting...by generously contributing to the BoochNonagon and helping us make this happen we will hand deliver to you or a lucky friend a cold bottle of tasty revitalizing, rejuvenating, probiotic-rich, fermented tea to their front door, side door, geodesic  dome, RV, pup tent or spaceship!  We'll even deliver a message from you to them, or from you to yourself, which could be get interesting.  Just give us a the recipients name and their camp name and/or nearest cross-streets and we'll take care of the rest.

Think of it like your friend is celebrating their birthday out of state and because you cant go you call the restaurant and have a pint of the the high life sent to their table but instead of the champagne of beers its really good kombucha and instead of a table at a swanky restaurant it's their dust infested parcel of playa.

Or if it's for yourself think of it like going into the future to give yourself a gift of kombucha from the past.

And finally, just so you know the quality of the kombucha we're talking about...the people who make this kombucha make about 1000 gallons a month and distribute locally in Austin..which is just to say this isn't your average kombucha...and all teas and herbs used are both fair trade and organic!

Here's how it works..

Select your level of support and donate and we'll contact you within a day or two to confirm (and profusely thank you!) and get the info for the intended recipient of the bottle.  If it is for you or a friend or an enemy or Larry Harvey, this is the time to tell us.  With the exception of Larry Harvey, we'll need to know where your friend is staying and cross streets are good but ideally we'll get cross streets AND a camp name and the recipients name.  This email correspondance with us will also be your chance to request that a message be delivered as well.  You can even ask us to sing the message in any style of music.  Be aware that we might be stumped in which case we'll probably just read the message normally and then do a stupid dance.  Actually the stupid dance will likely be included either way.

If you have any questions before or after you pledge support, please email us at boochnonagon@gmail.com


And finally look at some photos of the process of us making the boochnonagon and our tumbr page: http://boochnonagon.tumblr.com

(Last but not least thanks to TMBG for letting us use a clip from their awesome video!!)

story:
"Every portrait that is painted with feeling is a portrait of the artist, not the sitter"  - Oscar Wilde

Hello! My name is Bree Garland and I paint portraits of anyone and everyone here in sunny Portland, Oregon. Art has always been very important to me, but I didn't realize just how big of a role it played in my life until I was quickly approaching 30. Following a minor existential crisis at the age of 28, I bought a one way ticket to Europe, quit my serving job, and sold all of my belongings. I felt I had to figure out what I really wanted to do in life. I asked myself the question over and over. And every time the answer was Art. It scared me, and still does, because we live in a culture largely unsupportive of artists. But it's the only thing that makes me happy and I have to give happiness a chance or I will regret it for the rest of my life. Help me live my dream. Not only does it make me feel great, but all art enriches our souls and should never be squelched out.  When I packed up and went to Europe, it was very inspiring to people I know. I am hoping this will also do the same thing and encourage people to follow their dreams. If it turns out to work for me, then all the more reason to, right?! My goal is to show these portrait series in a gallery setting by the end of this year. 

This campaign is for 3 series of 9 portraits each:
 Game of Thrones: Jon Snow, Daenerys, Joffrey, Ygritte, Hodor, Cersei, Tyrion, Arya, and the Hound  (currently working on)

 Nudes: of me and all my friends. We are overcoming society-induced body insecurities and shaming together. All shapes, sizes and colors are beautiful. (currently working on, yet to have all 9 persons needed)
 

Celebrity regrets: you know, all those embarrassing moments captured in time. Like when Britney Spears shaved her head, or when Pee Wee Herman got arrested, or when Justin Timberlake had bleached and gelled hair like dried ramen noodles, most of courtney love's court appearances.. you get the idea. (yet to start or have all details of all 9 characters)


I'm asking for $3,000. Obviously any more would be a godsend.

Monies will go towards:

-canvases, mediums, oils, brushes, other painting supplies, and unforeseen costs. 

-business advancements like business cards, website, prints, and the campaign perks.

-perks will include merch from my RGBG (Ryan Gosling//Bree Garland) line, prints of the series, and more. (my cat is named Ryan Gosling for all those who don't know me personally)

-All the monies from the campaign will be used locally.

-I want to use this opportunity to launch my etsy account to bring in funds from prints of these series and more to come in the future. Ideally, to make this into a giving me tools to eat for a lifetime than for a day sort of situation.


This project is valuable because it will create a great sense of accomplishment and support for my artistic endeavors. I don't want to do this in vain, I believe in myself and in my art and I hope people feel feelings when they look at my portraits. If it emotes a feeling, whatever the feeling, or makes you think.. that is what I want at the base level. Art is crucial for everyone on earth. Art touches people, inspires them, gives meaning, and changes your views on life. People go insane, live, and die for their art and because of it.
"Without art, the crudeness of reality would make the world unbearable"- G.B. Shaw

Some risks and challenges?
Well, for starters I'm really putting it all out there. Lots of feelings of rejection could come from this. But, if that happens, it's alright. It's not going to stop me. I mean, I might cry. But I'll pick up the pieces and use it as fuel. Most of the influential artists died without much recognition, if any at all. Who knows what the future holds. That's the fun part about life!

Don't have any money but want to help me?
Share this link with your friends on stuff like Facebook, or instagram, or twitter, or whatever. Use the indiegogo share tools on this page!

 I HAVE A WEBSITE!! share it with your friends.

breegarland.com

story:
LEDMorpher-Overview

LEDMorpher is a tabletop size LED light show. It has LED's mounted on a propeller that spins while simultaneously rotating around a 2nd axis.  By changing the propeller speed, 2nd axis speed, color and frequency of the LED's, LEDMorpher delivers unlimited mind-blowing, continuously changing, fantastic, brilliantly colored visual effects.  You can manipulate MILLIONS of different colors, hues, intensities and paths of light to form unlimited displays, from counter-rotating spherical orbs to random light chaos.

LEDMorpher has 3 Function Modes:

  • Automatic show-30 minutes of wonder
  • Reacts to the Beat of Your Music
  • You Control It- Using IR Remote or Smartphone IR Remote with free APP

LEDMorpher is perfect for Desktop, Bartop, Coffee Table, or Dorm Room.

We need your backing for the first production order. We are ready to produce. In order to keep the price down we need to build these in at least 2,000 unit lot size.

 

By Backing us, you are Pre-Ordering your very own LEDMorpher at a substantially reduced cost.

 

 

How does it Work?

 1. Choose LEDMopher Model


2. Choose your Remote

 

 

3. Choose your Mode

 

 

Please check out our other video in the "Gallery"

 

Pics of the crazy beauty

 

For more photo's go to our FLIKR page

Or like us on Facebook.com/LEDMorpher

Project History

People have been playing with LED's ever since they were invented.  LED's emit a brilliant, sharp, and beautiful light. With the use of RGB(Red,Green,Blue) LED's and a digital driver, it is possible to create MILLIONS of different colors, hues, shades, and intensities of light.

 

 

The LEDMorpher project was started in Jan of 2011 to explore the idea of making a display device with LED's rotating 360 degrees, but also simultaneously around a second 360 axis.

 

 

The combination of 2 separate rotating axes would yield an ALL DIMENSION volumetric unlimited voxel display.  Early challenges centered around how to transmit digital control data not only across 1 spinning mass, but additionally across 2 simultaneously spinning masses without using any direct wiring or contact points.  This research lead to the invention of our "Digital Light Slip Ring" (Patent Pending). This makes controlling the LED's reliable and affordable for consumer product uses.

 

The next step of the project was to design a producible product that used the combination of manipulating the speed of the 2 separate axes along with changing the color and frequency of the LED's.  Further enhancements of the product include the 3 different modes of operation.

  • Automatic show runs from PIC chip
  • Music mode that responds to sound
  • Remote Control, where users manipulate features via remote control

Project Status

As you can see from the videos we've been working hard building prototypes, writing code, building tooling, and making the final adjustments for production. We've also filed for patent protection, trademarks and copyrights. We've visited, negotiated and selected the various component manufacturing partners that it takes to manufacture the LEDMorpher with care and strict attention to detail. The manufacturing plan is to bring in the sub-assemblies (Circuit Card, Motors, Flex Harness, Moldings, etc) from our manufacturing partners, and do the final assembly, quality testing, packaging and shipping in Florida. Since 1997,we have forged strong relationships with world class manufacturers in Shenzhen and  the surrounding area. In conjunction with this campaign we are currently running life testing, reliability testing, testing the pilot production units, and finishing the iOS and Android Apps. 

 

Please Help us get into Production

We need your support to take the LEDMorpher from prototype to production. Cutting edge technology is notoriously expensive. We have self funded the entire research, development and prototyping and tooling efforts to date. We think people will love playing with the LEDMorpher, we also believe in the power of community, the maker movement, open source, and hackers everywhere. So this is where you come in. In order to make this product available at a reasonable price, we need to manufacture in large quantities. You can be part of making this Cool LEDMorpher project a reality, your pledge will help us pay for:

  • Large volume sub-assembly orders(Manufacturers are ready)
  • Finish iOS and Android App interface and launch
  • Manufacturing support/oversight/freight

We dream of a community where creativity can become a reality because  passionate people love the idea enough to support it. Together we can do it!!

Backer Perks

Every LEDMorpher comes with:

  • Wall Power Adapter, 100-240v 50/60Hz with 10 foot cord(USA plug config)
  • Your choice of Controllers, either LEDMorpher IR Remote, or Smartphone Remote with free APP (iOS, or Android).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

After over 2 years of creativity, hard work, and 10 prototype versions we are finally ready to let the LEDMorpher  bring its special light show to planet Earth!  Your support is essential in helping us spread the light!  Thank you.

LEDMorpher has Patent Pending on its technology

LEDMorpher is a Trademark of LEDMorpher

  All brands, logos, and trademarks displayed and/or mentioned are used for informational purposes only and are sole property of each respected company. No endorsement implied.

Specs

  • Size LEDMorpher without stand is 8" diameter(globe size)- 10" Tall
  • Size LEDMorpher on Stand is 11" x 11" x 8"
  • Weight with stand is approx 4 lbs.
  • Power: Universal 100-240v 50/60HZ AC Input-UL approved Power Adapter Cable  10 foot long (supplied)
  • Indoor Use Recommended
  • Control via Remote Control only, choose, LEDMorpher IR Remote, or Smartphone IR Remote (supplied)
  • 12 Month Manufacturing Defects Replacement Warranty Included
  • All Carbon Fiber wrapped parts use 3M Ni-Doc Carbon Fiber Vinyl Film.

 

 FAQ

Hey, the music is cool..who is it?

Breaking Down by Retchild, Licensed thru Audiosparx.com

Can I operate the LEDMorpher in any orientation?

Yes, they work the same regardless of spatial orientation, you can hang them from the ceiling or sticking out from the wall.

What powers the LEDMorpher?

It is powered by 12vdc that is supplied from the included power adapter.  This power cable is 10 feet long and plugs into the wall socket. It has USA plug prongs, so International backers may have to use a plug adapter for their particular wall plug. It's universal Worldwide and works with 100-240v 50/60HZ.

Is the Software Opensource and  is it Hackable?

Yes, the software code will be available to any backer at reward shipment time, just be reminded that once you overwrite our stuff we're not responsible. We even built in a special Hacker Jack into the Circuit Board. You can plug into it and load your own code into the PIC, to make your own animations, designs, etc. Please send us videos of your work so we can post them on our website. We absolutely do not recommend removing the acrylic globe, if you do you might get your hand spanked from the rotating parts! Hack at your own risk. And we have to say this...it voids the warranty.

4D? Really?

Yes, sort of. The 4th dimension is commonly described by physicists as SpaceTime. In its simplest form it recognizes not only where something is within X-Y-Z, but WHEN something is there. Our brains recognize not only where light is, but where it used to be. In other words the human brain fills in the path of the LED's from past time to present time.  With all respect given to Quantum Relativity and String Theory, who really cares?? LEDMorpher is just plain cool to watch!

OK, so I'm a real Geek, tell me in more detail what is going on?

Here we go, the physical world is described in 3 dimensions, X-Y-Z. Within a fixed sphere every possible location instead of being designated by a Pixel(2D), its designated by a Voxel(3D). Unlike all other POV(Persistence of Vision) displays which only show you the outside of the sphere voxels, LEDMorpher is capable of lighting up almost (not the very center) all of the voxels in the entire sphere. That's because as you vary the speeds of the 2 different axes, you also change the arcs of travel, causing the LED's to intersect the interior portion of the sphere. You already know from the information above that the LEDMorpher is operated only by remote control. The reason for this is that the Circuit Board Assembly which controls everything needs to spin, so no physical control connections are possible.

The control board consists of several different parts. The first is the input receiver section, this section receives the IR signals from either the LEDMorpher IR Remote, or the Smartphone IR remote. The receiver section encodes the incoming signals and sends them to the PIC (Programmable Integrated Circuit) for further processing. The second section of the Circuit Board is the Music Sensing section. This consists of a microphone and encoding circuit that hears the music input and encodes it and sends the signal to the PIC for further processing. The propeller drive motor also lives on this board, the motor takes it speed signal from the pic output, driving the speed of the propeller. The PIC section is where the digital logic lives, and the computer Automatic Show is loaded into memory. The last section of the board is the output section. This is where the drivers for the RGB LED's are located.This RGB LED lighting information is sent up the propeller support to our Patent Pending "Digital Light Slip Ring" This is where the real magic happens, transmitting the digital signal to the spinning propeller without using any physical connections.  After traveling through the slip ring the control signals finally arrive at the LED's and they light as instructed. If you want to know more, I will probably have to hire you.
story_txt:
LEDMorpher-Overview
LEDMorpher is a tabletop size LED light show. It has LED's mounted on a propeller that spins while simultaneously rotating around a 2nd axis.  By changing the propeller speed, 2nd axis speed, color and frequency of the LED's, LEDMorpher delivers unlimited mind-blowing, continuously changing, fantastic, brilliantly colored visual effects.  You can manipulate MILLIONS of different colors, hues, intensities and paths of light to form unlimited displays, from counter-rotating spherical orbs to random light chaos.
LEDMorpher has 3 Function Modes:

Automatic show-30 minutes of wonder
Reacts to the Beat of Your Music
You Control It- Using IR Remote or Smartphone IR Remote with free APP

LEDMorpher is perfect for Desktop, Bartop, Coffee Table, or Dorm Room.
We need your backing for the first production order. We are ready to produce. In order to keep the price down we need to build these in at least 2,000 unit lot size.
 
By Backing us, you are Pre-Ordering your very own LEDMorpher at a substantially reduced cost.
 
 
How does it Work?
 1. Choose LEDMopher Model



 2. Choose your Remote
 
 
3. Choose your Mode
 

 

Please check out our other video in the "Gallery"
 
Pics of the crazy beauty
  
For more photo's go to our FLIKR page
Or like us on Facebook.com/LEDMorpher
Project History
People have been playing with LED's ever since they were invented.  LED's emit a brilliant, sharp, and beautiful light. With the use of RGB(Red,Green,Blue) LED's and a digital driver, it is possible to create MILLIONS of different colors, hues, shades, and intensities of light.
 

 
The LEDMorpher project was started in Jan of 2011 to explore the idea of making a display device with LED's rotating 360 degrees, but also simultaneously around a second 360 axis.
 
 
The combination of 2 separate rotating axes would yield an ALL DIMENSION volumetric unlimited voxel display.  Early challenges centered around how to transmit digital control data not only across 1 spinning mass, but additionally across 2 simultaneously spinning masses without using any direct wiring or contact points.  This research lead to the invention of our "Digital Light Slip Ring" (Patent Pending). This makes controlling the LED's reliable and affordable for consumer product uses.
 
The next step of the project was to design a producible product that used the combination of manipulating the speed of the 2 separate axes along with changing the color and frequency of the LED's.  Further enhancements of the product include the 3 different modes of operation.

Automatic show runs from PIC chip
Music mode that responds to sound
Remote Control, where users manipulate features via remote control

Project Status
As you can see from the videos we've been working hard building prototypes, writing code, building tooling, and making the final adjustments for production. We've also filed for patent protection, trademarks and copyrights. We've visited, negotiated and selected the various component manufacturing partners that it takes to manufacture the LEDMorpher with care and strict attention to detail. The manufacturing plan is to bring in the sub-assemblies (Circuit Card, Motors, Flex Harness, Moldings, etc) from our manufacturing partners, and do the final assembly, quality testing, packaging and shipping in Florida. Since 1997,we have forged strong relationships with world class manufacturers in Shenzhen and  the surrounding area. In conjunction with this campaign we are currently running life testing, reliability testing, testing the pilot production units, and finishing the iOS and Android Apps. 
 
Please Help us get into Production
We need your support to take the LEDMorpher from prototype to production. Cutting edge technology is notoriously expensive. We have self funded the entire research, development and prototyping and tooling efforts to date. We think people will love playing with the LEDMorpher, we also believe in the power of community, the maker movement, open source, and hackers everywhere. So this is where you come in. In order to make this product available at a reasonable price, we need to manufacture in large quantities. You can be part of making this Cool LEDMorpher project a reality, your pledge will help us pay for:

Large volume sub-assembly orders(Manufacturers are ready)
Finish iOS and Android App interface and launch
Manufacturing support/oversight/freight

We dream of a community where creativity can become a reality because  passionate people love the idea enough to support it. Together we can do it!!
Backer Perks
Every LEDMorpher comes with:

Wall Power Adapter, 100-240v 50/60Hz with 10 foot cord(USA plug config)


Your choice of Controllers, either LEDMorpher IR Remote, or Smartphone Remote with free APP (iOS, or Android).

  
 
 
 
 
 

 
 

 
 

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
After over 2 years of creativity, hard work, and 10 prototype versions we are finally ready to let the LEDMorpher  bring its special light show to planet Earth!  Your support is essential in helping us spread the light!  Thank you.
LEDMorpher has Patent Pending on its technology
LEDMorpher is a Trademark of LEDMorpher
  All brands, logos, and trademarks displayed and/or mentioned are used for informational purposes only and are sole property of each respected company. No endorsement implied.
Specs

Size LEDMorpher without stand is 8" diameter(globe size)- 10" Tall
Size LEDMorpher on Stand is 11" x 11" x 8"
Weight with stand is approx 4 lbs.
Power: Universal 100-240v 50/60HZ AC Input-UL approved Power Adapter Cable  10 foot long (supplied)
Indoor Use Recommended
Control via Remote Control only, choose, LEDMorpher IR Remote, or Smartphone IR Remote (supplied)
12 Month Manufacturing Defects Replacement Warranty Included
All Carbon Fiber wrapped parts use 3M Ni-Doc Carbon Fiber Vinyl Film.

 

 FAQ
Hey, the music is cool..who is it?
Breaking Down by Retchild, Licensed thru Audiosparx.com
Can I operate the LEDMorpher in any orientation?
Yes, they work the same regardless of spatial orientation, you can hang them from the ceiling or sticking out from the wall.
What powers the LEDMorpher?
It is powered by 12vdc that is supplied from the included power adapter.  This power cable is 10 feet long and plugs into the wall socket. It has USA plug prongs, so International backers may have to use a plug adapter for their particular wall plug. It's universal Worldwide and works with 100-240v 50/60HZ.
Is the Software Opensource and  is it Hackable?
Yes, the software code will be available to any backer at reward shipment time, just be reminded that once you overwrite our stuff we're not responsible. We even built in a special Hacker Jack into the Circuit Board. You can plug into it and load your own code into the PIC, to make your own animations, designs, etc. Please send us videos of your work so we can post them on our website. We absolutely do not recommend removing the acrylic globe, if you do you might get your hand spanked from the rotating parts! Hack at your own risk. And we have to say this...it voids the warranty.
4D? Really?
Yes, sort of. The 4th dimension is commonly described by physicists as SpaceTime. In its simplest form it recognizes not only where something is within X-Y-Z, but WHEN something is there. Our brains recognize not only where light is, but where it used to be. In other words the human brain fills in the path of the LED's from past time to present time.  With all respect given to Quantum Relativity and String Theory, who really cares?? LEDMorpher is just plain cool to watch!
OK, so I'm a real Geek, tell me in more detail what is going on?
Here we go, the physical world is described in 3 dimensions, X-Y-Z. Within a fixed sphere every possible location instead of being designated by a Pixel(2D), its designated by a Voxel(3D). Unlike all other POV(Persistence of Vision) displays which only show you the outside of the sphere voxels, LEDMorpher is capable of lighting up almost (not the very center) all of the voxels in the entire sphere. That's because as you vary the speeds of the 2 different axes, you also change the arcs of travel, causing the LED's to intersect the interior portion of the sphere. You already know from the information above that the LEDMorpher is operated only by remote control. The reason for this is that the Circuit Board Assembly which controls everything needs to spin, so no physical control connections are possible.
The control board consists of several different parts. The first is the input receiver section, this section receives the IR signals from either the LEDMorpher IR Remote, or the Smartphone IR remote. The receiver section encodes the incoming signals and sends them to the PIC (Programmable Integrated Circuit) for further processing. The second section of the Circuit Board is the Music Sensing section. This consists of a microphone and encoding circuit that hears the music input and encodes it and sends the signal to the PIC for further processing. The propeller drive motor also lives on this board, the motor takes it speed signal from the pic output, driving the speed of the propeller. The PIC section is where the digital logic lives, and the computer Automatic Show is loaded into memory. The last section of the board is the output section. This is where the drivers for the RGB LED's are located.This RGB LED lighting information is sent up the propeller support to our Patent Pending "Digital Light Slip Ring" This is where the real magic happens, transmitting the digital signal to the spinning propeller without using any physical connections.  After traveling through the slip ring the control signals finally arrive at the LED's and they light as instructed. story:
¿HAMSTERS?

Nosotros somos los HAMSTERS, un grupo de pintores emergentes.

 Definimos una producción particular entendiendo nuestro quehacer pictórico como una disciplina compleja del conocimiento humano; idea que caracteriza nuestras piezas.


Integrados por Alejandra Mosig, Angel Orea, Marcos Gonzalez, Mónica Figueroa y Omar Ibáñez; instalamos nuestro lugar de trabajo en la Santa María la Ribera, una bella colonia en la ciudad de México y lo nombramos C.O.P.


¿Qué es el C.O.P.?

El Centro de Operaciones Pictóricas (C.O.P). es un proyecto destinado a promover la pintura emergente y contemporánea de calidad. 


Las finalidades del C.O.P. son las siguientes: 

1. Crear un espacio para la producción de pintura emergente.
2. Divulgar conocimientos artísticos.
3. Hacer de la Colonia Santa María la Ribera un referente pictórico de la Ciudad de México.




Para lograr los objetivos del COP, además del trabajo de producción y gestión, es necesario acondicionar el espacio físico, el cual buscamos costear a través de la participación del público en esta campaña.

Así podremos ofrecer actividades como exposiciones, mesas de debate, talleres, proyecciones y productos culturales de calidad, en un lugar con las instalaciones más adecuadas.



Recompensas


Con tu colaboración, además de estar apoyando un proyecto que busca sanear la falta de espacios alternativos para la pintura emergente, obtendrás una de las muchas recompensas que hemos preparado e­specialmente para ti:

-Prints.

Te enviaremos un Print de la pieza de nuestra producción que más te guste, con el agradecimiento personalizado del grupo.

-Dibujos

Te entregaremos un dibujo original, del integrante del grupo que tú elijas. Dibujos que forman parte nuestros procesos de producción pictórica.

-Tazas Horneadas

Haremos llegar a tu casa, una taza horneada con divertidos diseños hechos por distintos integrantes del grupo.


-Paquetes de dibujos

Por tu apoyo, recibirás un paquete con 5 dibujos. Elaborados por cada uno de los integrantes del grupo; con el agradecimiento y dedicatoria de los HAMSTERS.

-Pintura Original (pequeño formato)



-Pintura Original (mediano formato)

HAMSTERS preparará una exposición especial con piezas hechas exclusivamente para ti; en este evento podrás escoger la pintura de pequeño o mediano formato que tú prefieras; estas piezas vienen con su respectivo certificado de autenticidad.

-




Para qué lo usaremos


Hemos establecido una meta de 6,000 dólares, que serán distribuidos en distintos rubros 

  • reparación de la instalación eléctrica, 
  • Iluminación adecuada para exposiciones
  • mejoramiento del piso.
  • reparación de baños.
  • pintura para el edificio. 








Además nos encantará seguir en contacto con ustedes, a través de nuestros medios para mostrarles los avances de nuestro trabajo y los resultados de su apoyo.


El impacto

El edificio que adoptamos como centro de trabajo, ubicado en la calle de Laurel numero 41, fue construido con el fin de ser laboratorios escolares a principios de la década de los 90 y posteriormente abandonado en 1999.

Como HAMSTERS, llegamos a este edificio en diciembre del 2013 para sacar a este espacio del abandono, trabajando duro, resanando y pintando las paredes, limpiando pisos y ventanas. Comenzamos este proyecto que presentamos oficialmente el 4 de enero de 2014 con nuestra primera exposición como grupo  titulada “Obra Negra”.





Hasta el día de hoy , llevamos más de 7 meses trabajando para  instaurar el Centro de Operaciones Pictóricas como un referente de pintura emergente en la ciudad de México.

Comenzando con el lugar menos "apropiado" y con pocas expectativas de la gente hacia nuestra idea; hemos realizado 9 eventos, entre exposiciones individuales una colectiva y diversas actividades dentro y fuera del espacio; con excelentes resultados que han sido reseñados por diversos medios, en formatos tanto impresos como digitales, en más de 15 ocasiones. 

Ahora, buscamos potenciar los resultados del trabajo que hemos realizado antes sin esta ayuda.













Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Entendemos las dificultades económicas que pueden existir para que participes en la campaña; por eso, valoramos muchísimo el que puedas ayudarnos a compartir esta propuesta y hacer que más personas conozcan nuestro proyecto.

story:
UPDATE: With ten hours left to go, I am ecstatically grateful for all the people that have helped me reach my goal so quickly. I am thrilled to announce that I will be having a second solo show in 2013, at the InPost Arts Space in Albuquerque, NM. I also will be showing in an international show about the nuclear legacy, and have been invited to do a totally AWESOME residency with Signal Fire. Through the amazing generosity of my friends and family and art community, I believe these opportunities are going to be wonderful. The surplus of funds are going to enable me to further my research, create a new bodies of work, and facilitate this showing. I feel ambitious and inspired because of YOU! Thank you for giving your time and energy and resources to the arts!


I am an artist. I have dedicated my life to creativity. I have focused my interests, honed my craft, pursued every opportunity, and now am on the threshold of the largest milestone of my career so far. I am being given the opportunity to present the first comprehensive exhibition of my work. The Oats Park Art Center in Fallon, Nevada will dedicate its’ entire 2100 square foot gallery space to my work in the spring and summer of 2013. Please consider contributing to this campaign to help cover my costs for this show.

This moment is especially dynamic for me because I am in the process of fusing my passions into a career. This exhibition will culminate 10 years of painting and drawing, making clear both my underlying interests and my development as an artist. Since I began painting and drawing, I have been creatively chronicling the evidence of human need and its’ deleterious effect on the landscape. My work stems from historic and environmental research, which has continually led me to Nevada. Mines, weapons arsenals, industrial scale farming, and nuclear test sites surround the town of Fallon. Showing my work in Fallon, Nevada will further the relationship that I am fostering with rural peoples, places, and issues.

The Oats Park Art Center is beautiful and supportive, yet has a small budget. They will provide exhibition space and facilities cost for the duration of the exhibit, and a small stipend for an artist talk. I am responsible for the remainder of expenses. My financial resources are meager. With the success of this campaign, I will produce a professional exhibition that will accelerate my career and validate my work. The money I raise will be used to frame 5 large drawings, build protective crates for more than 20 paintings, and to rent and fuel a truck to move these paintings from New Mexico to Nevada and back. I will travel with the work, and install the show myself.

I see this exhibition as the greatest opportunity I have yet been presented with. Please help me make it a reality!
